title:

***Action***
Wild Card (2015)

Furious 7 (2015)
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140826215308/total-movies/images/4/49/Fast_%26_Furious_7_poster.jpg http://xpressmag.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/furious-7.jpg HD CAM - Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
The Expendables 3 (2014) http://thefile.me/lw0hdxsytfx7 http://rozup.ir/up/moviestar100/Pictures/d5_expendables_3.jpg http://www.filmdivider.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/expendables-3.jpeg Barney augments his team with new blood for a personal battle: to take down Conrad Stonebanks, the Expendables co-founder and notorious arms trader who is hell bent on wiping out Barney and every single one of his associates.
300: Rise of an Empire (2014) http://www.deadlyblogger.com/NewRelease/300rise.mp4 http://blogs-images.forbes.com/markhughes/files/2014/08/300-roae-3.jpg http://moviefail.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/300riseofanempire-1.jpg Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.
Need for Speed (2014) http://www.deadlyblogger.com/NewRelease/needforspeed.mp4 http://www.movpins.com/big/MV5BMTQ3ODY4NzYzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjI3OTE4MDE/need-for-speed-(2014).jpg http://www.hdwallpapersonly.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/need-for-speed-movie-cars-1.jpg Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins..
American Sniper (2014)
http://i.harperapps.com/covers/9780062401724/y450-293.png http://www.ew.com/sites/default/files/i/2014/12/18/american-sniper_612x380_1.jpg Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.
Dracula Untold (2014)
http://cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/dracula-untold-poster.jpg http://www.blastr.com/sites/blastr/files/DraculaUntold.jpg As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.
Taken 3 (2014)
http://img5.downloadha.com/hosein/Movie/January%202015/28/Taken-3-2014-cover-large.jpg http://porhomme.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/taken-3-trailer-liam-neeson-whitaker-2015-movies.jpeg Ex-government operative Bryan Mills is accused of a ruthless murder he never committed or witnessed. As he is tracked and pursued, Mills brings out his particular set of skills to find the true killer and clear his name.
Fury (2014) http://www.promptfile.com/l/BD25D539D2-8E58EEA1A7 http://www.thaidvd.biz/images/D5_Fury_2014.jpg http://mantheline.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/fury.jpg April, 1945. As the Allies make their final push in the European Theatre, a battle-hardened Army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and his five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered, out-gunned, and with a rookie soldier thrust into their platoon, Wardaddy and his men face overwhelming odds in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.
Hercules (2014)
http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/915zrle1jhL._SL1500_.jpg http://www.zdistrict.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/09/Hercules-2014_04.jpg Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NjA1ODgzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM2MTI4MjE@._V1_SX214_AL_.jpg https://thewolfmancometh.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/john-wick-movie-keanu-reeves-gun-church.jpg An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.
